name: Survive - The Heretic
description:
Combining MEDIEVAL with SURVIVAL

"Survive - The Heretic" is a mix of medieval and survival in third person mode. You'll play a templar who was banned on an island where the undeads rule.

Craft weapons, build bases, find food. Theese are the tasks of a survivor. But thats not as easy as it sounds, hundrets of zombies will make your life hard!

You start somewhere on the island, gather some fur and wood for your first shelter, a simple tent, and you will hopefully survive the first night.

Defend yourself against mutated templars!

Features:

- Collect Resources (Wood, Stone...)

- Build structures or even big bases (Yes right, basebuilding)!

- Fight against mutated templar knights

- Collect food

- Dynamic Day/Night Cylce

- Third Person view

- Big open world environment

- Randomly triggered zombie Horde attacks

Start your survival story right now!
